mapper.sql: ID, PatientID, EquipmentID, TestingTime, HeartRate, TimeLength, Remark, CreatedOn, `State`
mapper.select: SELECT a.HeartRate AS heartRate, SUBSTRING(a.TestingTime, 1, 20) AS collectionTime, CONVERT(varchar(100), b.ParsingTime, 120) AS uploadTime, a.TimeLength AS recordCount, b.ParsingResult AS analyseResult, b.Baojjy AS suggestion, b.DiagnosticDoc AS doctorName, b.ElectrocardiogramsUrl AS ecgImage FROM ElectrocardioHistory a, Electrocardiograms b WHERE a.ID = b.Eid AND a.PatientID = #{patientId} AND a.ID = #{id}

SELECT TOP 1 heartrate AS heartRate, dig.Baojjy AS suggestion, dig.ElectrocardiogramsUrl AS ecgImage, dig.ParsingResult AS analyseResult FROM ElectrocardioHistory his LEFT JOIN Electrocardiograms dig ON his.id = dig.Eid WHERE PatientID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY TestingTime DESC
